tennis: Who was the first men's tennis player to win 1000 matches?
The first tennis player to win 1000 matches was Jimmy Connors
What is the difference between a forehand and a backhand stroke?
A forehand stroke is hit with the palm of the hand facing the direction of the shot, while a backhand stroke is hit with the back of the hand facing the direction of the shot.
What is the scoring system in a tennis match?
The scoring system in tennis is 0, 15, 30, 40, and game.
What is the difference between a lob and a drop shot?

A lob is a shot hit high above the court and then comes back down onto the other side, while a drop shot is a soft shot that goes just over the net and then lands just over the baseline on the opposite side.
What is the name of the referee who makes the final call on line calls?
The name of the referee who makes the final call on line calls is the Umpire.
What is the maximum number of sets that are typically played in a tennis match?
The maximum number of sets that are typically played in a tennis match is three.
What is the name of the shot where the player hits the ball and does not move his or her feet?
The shot where the player hits the ball and does not move his or her feet is called the sitter.
What type of surface is usually used for professional tennis matches?
The type of surface usually used for professional tennis matches is an acrylic hard court.
What are the four Grand Slam tournaments in tennis?
The four Grand Slam tournaments in tennis are the Australian Open, the French Open, Wimbledon, and the US Open.
What other name is the Championship Tie-Break also known as?
The Championship Tie-Break is also known as a “sudden death” tie-break.
astronomy: What is the name of the largest planet in our solar system?
Самая большая планета в нашей солнечной системе - Юпитер.
What is the name of the largest moon in our solar system?
Ганимед является самой большой луной нашей солнечной системы.
How old is the universe?
Вселенная имеет 13,8 млрд. лет.
How many stars are in the Milky Way?
Около 300 миллионов звезд находятся в Млечном Пути.
What is the rotation period of Jupiter?
Период вращения Юпитера составляет 9,9 суток.
What is the average temperature of the Sun?
Средняя температура Солнца составляет приблизительно 5500 К.
What is the brightest star in the night sky?
На ночью самым ярким звездой является Сириус.
How big is the observable universe?
Обозримая вселенная имеет размер приблизительно 91 млрд. световых лет.
How much does the Earth weigh?
Масса Земли составляет приблизительно 5,972 трлн тонн.
How long does it take for light from the Sun to reach Earth?
Свету от Солнца до Земли приходится 8 минут.
harry potter: What is the name of Harry Potter's owl?
El buho de Harry Potter es Hedwig.
What's the make and model of Harry Potter's wand?
La varita de Harry Potter mide 11 pulgadas y está hecha de madera de acebo, con un núcleo de pluma de fénix.
What kind of pet does Ron Weasley have?
Ron Weasley tiene una rata como mascota llamada Scabbers.
Which house does Harry Potter belong to?
Harry Potter pertenece a la casa Gryffindor.
Who is Harry Potter's worst enemy?
El peor enemigo de Harry Potter es Lord Voldemort.
What are the three unforgivable curses?
Las tres maldiciones imperdonables son la Avada Kedavra, la Imperio y la Cruciatus.
What is the name of the book series Harry Potter belongs to?
El nombre de la serie de libros a la que pertenece Harry Potter es Harry Potter y las Reliquias de la Muerte.
What spell does Harry use to make things fly?
Harry utiliza el hechizo Wingardium Leviosa para hacer que las cosas vuelen.
What is the name of the school that Harry Potter attends?
La escuela a la que asiste Harry Potter se llama Colegio Hogwarts de Magia y Hechicería.
Who is the Headmaster of Hogwarts at the beginning of the series?
Al principio de la serie, el director de Hogwarts es Albus Dumbledore.
math: What is the square root of 100?
La racine carrée de 100 est 10.
What does the Pythagorean theorem show
La théorème de Pythagore montre que la somme des carrés des deux côtés plus courts d'un triangle rectangle est égale au carré de l'hypoténuse.
What is the difference between rational numbers and integers?
Les nombres rationnels sont des nombres pouvant être exprimés sous forme de rapport entre deux nombres entiers, tandis que les nombres entiers sont des nombres entiers.
What is a constant in algebra?
Une constante en algèbre est une valeur qui reste toujours la même.
What is the sum of two and seven?
La somme de deux et sept est neuf.
What is a factor in math?
Un facteur en mathématiques est une valeur qui divise un nombre entier sans le laisser diviser par un autre nombre entier.
What is the formula for the area of a triangle?
La formule pour le calcul de l'aire d'un triangle est A =  1/2  base  × hauteur.
What is the degree of a polynomial?
Le degré d'un polynôme est le degré maximal des monômes qui le composent.
What is the mean of a set of numbers?
La moyenne d'un ensemble de nombres est la somme des nombres divisée par le nombre total de nombres.
What is the law of cosines?
La loi des cosinus est une relation entre les longueurs des côtés d'un triangle quelconque et le cosinus de l'angle inclus entre eux.
london: What kind of vehicles is London famous for?
London ist berühmt für seine Doppeldeckerbusse.
What is the name of the famous clock tower in London?
Der berühmte Glockenturm in London ist Big Ben.
What kind of test do London taxi drivers have to pass?
Londoner Taxi-Fahrer müssen einen Test namens Knowledge bestehen.
How many tubes are there in the London Underground?
Es gibt 11 Linien im Londoner U-Bahn-System.
What is the name of the oldest bridge across the Thames?
Die älteste Brücke über die Themse heißt die London Bridge.
What is the name of the famous palace in London?
Der berühmte Palast in London ist der Buckingham Palace.
What is the name of the most famous street in London?
Die bekannteste Straße in London ist die Oxford Street.
What is the name of London's most famous cathedral?
Der berühmteste Kirchenbau in London ist der St. Paul's Cathedral.
What is the largest square in London?
Die größte Platz in London ist der Trafalgar Square.
What is the name of the largest park in London?
Der größte Park in London ist der Hyde Park.
fish: What fish is typically found in sushi?
Il tonno e il salmone sono di solito presenti nei sushi.
What fish is poisonous when prepared wrong?
La prelibatezza giapponese fugu, o pesce palla, è velenoso se preparata in modo sbagliato.
What is the largest fish in the world?
Il pesce più grande del mondo è lo squalo balena.
What is the most popular fish for eating?
Il pesce più popolare da mangiare è il salmone.
What is the most common type of pet fish?
La specie più comune di pesci da acquario è il Guppy.
What is the smallest fish in the world?
Il pesce più piccolo del mondo è lo zygopterus juvenilis.
What is the fastest fish in the world?
Il pesce più veloce del mondo è lo squalo toro.
What is the most dangerous fish in the world?
Il pesce più pericoloso del mondo è il pesce palla.
How many different species of fish are there?
Ci sono più di 34.000 specie di pesci diverse.
What type of fish can breathe air?
Alcune specie di pesci come i pesci gatto possono respirare l'aria.
wine: What are the two main types of wine?
Os dois principais tipos de vinho são tinto e branco.
What is the name of the wine region in France that produces the most wine?
A região vinícola na França que produz a maioria dos vinhos é Bordeaux.
What is wine made from?
O vinho é feito de uvas.
What type of wine is Champagne?
O champanhe é um tipo de vinho espumante.
What is the name of the wine-making region in Italy?
A região vinícola da Itália é chamada de Toscana.
How old does a wine grape have to be to be used in the making of a quality wine?
Uma uva de vinho de qualidade precisa ter pelo menos três anos de idade.
What is a “wine cork”?
Um “cortiça de vinho” é um tampão ou selo feito de cortiça natural, usado para fechar garrafas de vinho.
How long should wine be aged before it is consumed?
O vinho deve ser envelhecido por pelo menos alguns meses antes de ser consumido.
What temperature should wine be served at?
Vinhos tintos devem ser servidos a uma temperatura entre 15 e 18 °C; vinhos brancos, a uma temperatura entre 8 e 11 °C.
What are the components of wine that contribute to its flavor?
Os componentes principais que contribuem para o sabor do vinho incluem álcool, açucares, sais minerais, antioxidantes, ácidos orgânicos, aldeídos, esteróis e fitoesteróis.
dogs: What is the name of the most popular dog breed in the United States?
アメリカで最も人気の犬種はラブラドール・レトリバーです。
What wild animal is genetically related to the domestic dog?
野生動物で、家畜のいぬの先祖は狼です。
What is the name of the dog breed that is the smallest in the world?
世界で最も小さな犬の品種はチワワです。
What is the most popular doggy sport in Japan?
日本で最も人気の犬の運動はドッグフライヤーです。
What is the name of the most iconic breed of guard dog?
最も知られている警備犬の品種は、ヨークシャーテリアです。
What is the most beloved pet animal in Japanese culture?
日本文化で大人気のペット動物は、犬です。
What is the oldest known domesticated dog breed?
最も古い家畜の犬種はシベリアンハスキーです。
How often do adult dogs need to go to the vet?
大人のいぬはいつもどれぐらい獣医師のところに行くべきですか？一年に一回以上の病院に行くことをお勧めします。
How long is a dog's lifespan on average?
いぬの平均寿命は何年ですか？10〜13年ぐらいです。
What type of food is best for a healthy dog?
健康ないぬに最適な食べ物は何ですか？健康な肉を主食にし、ミックスドッグフードに肌から栄養を摂ることをお勧めします。
programming: What is the name of the markup language that is commonly used in websites?
使用来创建网站的编程语言是 HTML
What is functional programming?
函数式编程是一种编程范式，将计算视为数学函数的求值，避免了变量状态和可变数据。
Who are some pioneers of computer science?
艾伦·图灵、格雷斯·霍珀和艾达·洛夫莱斯都是计算机科学的先驱者。
What is the purpose of debugging?
调试的目的是发现和消除计算机程序中的错误、隐藏的缺陷或者理解更多的程序运行原理。
What is the difference between a compiler and an interpreter?
编译器将源代码编译成目标代码，而解释器则直接执行源代码。
What is the difference between a programming language and a scripting language?
编程语言是指将代码编译成字节码，而脚本语言是指解释执行代码。
What is Object-Oriented Programming?
面向对象编程是一种以对象（拥有属性和方法的数据结构）为基础的编程技术。
What is an algorithm?
优化算法是一种用来解决特定问题的指令集，其目的是在给定的计算资源（如时间和空间）的情况下，让计算机的性能和效率尽可能的好。
What are the main features of a programming language?
程序设计语言的主要特点包括可编程性、类型、可读性、可扩展性、可维护性以及可移植性。
What are the benefits of using a database?
使用数据库可以减少空间占用，可以高效存放、管理、处理大量数据，并提供安全的访问功能。
star wars: Who created Star Wars?
조지 루카스가 스타워즈를 만들었습니다.
What is the name of the main character in Star Wars?
스타 워즈 의 주요 캐릭터는 루크 스카이워커 입니다.
What is the Death Star in Star Wars?
스타워즈에서 데스 스타는 초강력 광물로 행성을 파괴할 수 있는 우주 기지입니다.
What color lightsabers do monks and Jedi masters use?
수도승과 제다이 마스터들은 검은 색의 라이트 세이버를 사용합니다.
Who is Darth Vader?
다스 베이더는 스타 워즈 시리즈에서 마스터 스핀 주인공이며, 카타 방콕강 괴물이자 주인공들의 강력한 적입니다.
Who are the Jedi?
제다이는 스타워즈 세계에서 마법 같은 힘을 가진 무기를 사용하는 스펙터라는 단체로 잘 알려져 있습니다.
What are midi-chlorians?
미디-클로리안은 스타워즈 세계에서 포스 스퓨즈를 이용하는 것을 가능하게 하는 것으로 분자 수준에서 존재하는 양자 마법의 시스템입니다.
What is an X-wing fighter?
X-wing fighter는 스타워즈 시리즈에서 비행 기체로 사용되는 비행기로, 스타 디스트로이어 기지를 보안하는 데 사용됩니다.
What is the Force?
포스는 스타 워즈에서 일어나는 위대한 마법같은 사건들을 통해 주인공들이 액션을 취함으로써 일어나는 에너지입니다.
Who are the Sith?
시스는 스타워즈 세계에서 포스를 사용하는 악마적인 단체로, 절대적인 권력을 추구하며 제다이 보다는 어둠의 힘을 사용합니다.
rap music: Where was rap music invented?
Rap müzik Bronx, New York'ta icat edildi.
Who is the best-selling rap artist?
En çok satan rap sanatçısı Eminem'dir.
What is the name of the first rap song to be played on the radio?
Radyoda çalınan ilk rap şarkısı The Sugarhill Gang tarafından Rapper's Delight olarak adlandırılmıştır.
What year did rap music become popular?
Rap müzik 1990'larda popüler olmaya başladı.
What style of rap music is most popular today?
Bugün en popüler rap müziği hip-hop tarzıdır.
What language is rap music usually performed in?
Rap müzik genellikle İngilizce müzik olarak performans gösterilir.
What are some of the most popular rap groups?
En popüler rap grupları arasında OutKast, Wu Tang Clan ve N.W.A gibi gruplar vardır.
What is rap battle?
Rap mücadele yapma, yani iki veya daha fazla kişi arasında rap yarışıdır.
What instruments are typically used in rap music?
Rap müziğinde genellikle davul, gitar, klavye ve çeşitli perdeler kullanılır.
Who is the most famous Turkish rapper?
En ünlü Türk rapçisi Fuat Ergin'dir.
